scenes.description: Instrumental introduction with an orchestral ensemble and live band. A holographic figure of Hoshimachi Suisei gradually forms on stage.
Live performance of the song 'Allegro'. Hoshimachi Suisei sings as a hologram, accompanied by a live band and dynamic visual effects.
